ncl.restart.title: Config requires restart!
ncl.restart.message: One or more options needs you to restart the game to apply the changes.
ncl.gui.cancel.tooltip: Forgets pending changes and closes the GUI.
ncl.gui.reset.tooltip: Resets all options to default. (This is reversible!)
ncl.gui.undo.tooltip: Reverts all options back to what they were before editing.
ncl.gui.fail_apply.tooltip: There was an error and the changes couldn't be applied.
ncl.gui.save_before_exit.tooltip: Save or cancel to exit the GUI.
ncl.flag.game_restart: You must restart the game for changes to take effect
